message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $10500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9800. I think that's a fair compromise.
